Martinez.preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Negroni.preparation: Build into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

Singapore Sling.preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice except grenadine. Strain into a hurricane glass with ice. Float grenadine on top. Garnish with a cherry and a slice of pineapple.

Vesper.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
